page.title: 16INDUSTRY(1)
page.content: The centre of Leyland contains a number of old established industries on which the prosperity of the town was once built.{Leyland Motors(British {Leyland)}is the largest employer in Leyland with a total workforce of 12000 in the group which includes multi/parts bus and trucks.The best selling buses are the Tiger and the Olympian while trucks include the Roadrunner,Roadtrain,and freighter.The most important market for buses and trucks is the U.K. but Leyland export to many countries ,mainly in the third world.{The Leyland and Birmingham {Rubber Co.}was founded by James Quin in 1860 in what was once the workhouse.They produce a variety of rubber products including rubber matting, squash balls, yacht fenders and types of sports equipment.
